attributes.action: Give nurses and care workers an additional months ‘summer bonus’ pay this June.
attributes.background: Provide NHS nurses and front line care workers with an additional months pay as a ‘summer bonus’ for June 2021. As a thank you for their efforts and hard work during the pandemic.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562495
